'''Hash''' is a dry biome, added in [[24w14potato]]. It generates in the [[Potato dimension]].

== Description ==
No trees, flowers, or grass generate in hash. The surface of this biome is covered in [[gravtater]], and the only plants that are growing here are [[potato]]es. Besides those, [[dead bush]]es and [[Block of Potato Peels|blocks of lime potato peels]] (imitating cacti) can be found on the surface.

[[Terre de pomme]] generates in much smaller quantities than in the other four potato biomes: it can only be found on edges of terrain, sometimes preventing gravtater from falling.

Features unique to this biome include the [[hash well]] and groups of "venomous columns", which consist of 1-3 blocks of gravtater with a [[vicious potato]] on top.
